CommentBody:
Probably need to confirm a few things. Best to get on a call.
First Place is in the Settings > Application Node.
There is a Host Target Options Setting - make sure its set to "use Host name" not "prefer DNS name if available"
This setting can cause host lists to switch to FQDN when jobs are run.

Then I would of course confirm the correct host lists with the names as we expect are in place.

I would also doublecheck on these SQL servers in the Query > Filter > Connections Screen Make sure they successfully connect there as expected.

I attempted to call the customer through +91 8667733756, customer was not available.
I will send an email to the customer
The customer is in a different time zone and requested to work with someone in the IST time zone.
